verbs.description: NEW YORK ( AP ) — [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: signaled] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: that it intends to pull back on investigating potential abuses by companies in the $ 1.5 trillion student loan market] .
